description: A React component named DeviceTable that manages and displays a list of network devices with functionalities such as search, filter, sort, pagination, and actions like delete and ping. It fetches data from external APIs, handles user interactions, and renders a table with device information.

methods.name: fetchData
methods.description: Fetches the list of devices from the API based on current filters, sort, and pagination.

methods.name: onSortClick
methods.description: Handles sorting field change when user clicks on a table header to sort by that column.

methods.name: onDelete
methods.description: Opens confirmation dialog for deleting a device.

methods.name: confirmDeleteAction
methods.description: Performs the device deletion API call upon user confirmation.

methods.name: onPing
methods.description: Triggers a ping to the device if monitoring is enabled, handling API response and updating UI accordingly.
